alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 07 at 2:36AM PST until November 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations 3 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Chesaw Road, Sherman Pass, Brewster, Winthrop, Twisp, Inchelium, Conconully, Waterville, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Bridgeport, Badger Mountain Road, Mansfield, Wauconda, Loup Loup Pass, Mazama, Oroville, Methow, Okanogan, Nespelem, Republic, Omak, Boulder Creek Road, and Disautel Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...The strong winds and weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult. Winter travel conditions are likely.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Do not touch downed lines and report any power outages to your electric company. Travel is highly discouraged due to slick roadways and the possibility of downed trees and power lines.
